courses.description:
Estás aquí porque quieres aumentar la productividad de tu negocio con las herramientas de Google, ¿verdad?

Tal vez eres nuevo en el uso de las herramientas de Google, o quizás tienes algo de experiencia pero necesitas ayuda para gestionar de forma adecuada tu negocio.

Aumenta la eficiencia de tu equipo con las herramientas de Google. Descubre el potencial de Gmail, Google Meet, Google Drive, Google Docs, Google Forms, Google Calendar, Google Sites, Google Traductor y YouTube y todas las herramientas que componen la suite. Mejora procesos, organiza información y comunícate de manera colaborativa con tu equipo.


EN ESTE CURSO, APRENDERÁS:


Cómo dominar las interfaces de los programas de oficina de Google.
Cómo realizar reuniones, videoconferencias, clases y webinars con Google Meet.
Cómo subir videos a un canal de YouTube y gestionar correctamente todas las funciones de la plataforma.
Cómo realizar transmisiones en directo desde un canal de YouTube.
Cómo gestionar eficazmente cuentas de correo en Gmail.
Cómo almacenar y organizar archivos y datos en equipo con Google Drive.
Cómo crear una página web de forma rápida y sencilla con Google Sites.
Cómo administrar el tiempo con Google Calendar.
Cómo crear exámenes, encuestas y landing pages con Google Forms.
Cómo redactar documentos eficientes con Google Docs.
Cómo traducir textos y documentos con Google Traductor.
Cómo almacenar y organizar fotos con Google Fotos.
Cómo buscar vuelos a menor precio con Google Flights.
Cómo Investigar tendencias de búsquedas en Google Trends.
Cómo aprender a dibujar con Autodraw.
Cómo realizar búsquedas avanzadas y exactas en Google.



¡PONIENDO EN PRACTICA TODO LO APRENDIDO!


Las herramientas de colaboración de Google son un conjunto de servicios que lo usan millones de personas en el mundo, y seguramente tú lo sabes usar también, y si no sabes de qué te estoy hablando o manejas otros servicios de colaboración similares, entonces te invito a que descubras todo su potencial. ¡Te fascinará!.

Cualquiera que sea su motivación para comenzar a usar las herramientas de Google, ha venido al lugar correcto.

En este curso , no solo aprenderás a organizarte mejor, sino que lograrás optimizar tu trabajo y por tanto mejorarás tu productividad.

Encontrarás herramientas de apoyo para que puedas trabajar en contacto permanente con tu equipo de trabajo, de estudio o incluso con personas ajenas a tu campo de acción.

Aprenderás a crear y compartir documentos online, usando herramientas de colaboración en línea, para que tengas todo centralizado y actualizado; aprenderás a conocer la disponibilidad de tu equipo, con los calendarios compartidos para que puedas agendar tus reuniones.

Y lo mejor es que también recibirás algunas estrategias por parte de tu instructor, para que aprendas a automatizar y programar el envío de correos electrónicos.



¡LLEGÓ LA HORA DE COMENZAR A USAR LAS HERRAMIENTAS DE GOOGLE PARA HACER CRECER TU NEGOCIO!

El curso está especialmente dirigido a personas que quieran ser más eficientes usando el correo electrónico y herramientas de colaboración con la tecnología de Google.

En base al carácter introductorio del curso, no es necesario que dispongas de conocimientos previos sobre alguno de los puntos para poder participar y sacar el máximo provecho del curso. Solo necesitarás un ordenador con conexión estable a Internet y disponer de una cuenta de Google o Gmail.


¿QUÉ ME CALIFICA PARA ENSEÑARTE?

Mi nombre es Renato y soy el creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en el tema de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), más de 80 MILLONES de reproducciones y miles de comentarios en mis tutoriales, tales como estos:


Hola te felicito por los tutoriales, muy bien explicados y sobretodo de mucha utilidad. Gracias y saludos. - RIGO Tovar
Muy buena las explicaciones en sus tutoriales, lo felicito. - Carlos Cabarcas
Excelente caballero muchas gracias por tan buen aporte. - Alexander Grayson
Muchas gracias, bien explicado y efectivamente muy ÚTIL.  - Dulce Rodríguez
Gracias por tu video fue muy sencillo el procedimiento y muy ùtil. - Verónica Trujillo


¡MI PROMESA PARA TI!

Soy un instructor en línea a tiempo completo. Estaré aquí para usted en cada paso del camino. Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.


Quiero que este sea el mejor CURSO DE HERRAMIENTAS DE GOOGLE que se encuentre en Internet. Entonces, si hay alguna manera de mejorar este curso, solo dígame y lo haré realidad.


¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!
Saludos,
Renato Jesús Yacolca Neyra
target_audience: Estudiantes y empleados que deseen sacar el máximo provecho a los correos electrónicos y las herramientas de colaboración de Google.
Toda persona que desee aprender desde cero el uso de los correos electrónicos y las herramientas de colaboración de Google.

Personas que saben usar el correo electrónico y las herramientas de colaboración de Google, pero desean descubrir funcionalidades que por desconocimiento de los usuarios son poco usadas, pero muy útiles y potentes.
Personas que quieran ser más eficientes usando el correo electrónico y las herramientas de colaboración con la tecnología de Google.

requirements: Google アカウントを持っていること
基本的なパソコン操作ができること
本コースの動画は2019/01/10 に収録したものです。また、Chromeのバージョンは収録時点での最新版（71.0.3578.98）です。
courses.description:
■■ このコースを通じて、Google スプレッドシートの基本機能を活用した利便性の高い資料を作成できるようになります。 ■■

今まで表計算ソフトといえば、Microsoft 社が提供するExcel（エクセル）が一般的でした。
みなさんも、Excel を使って売上管理や課題管理、見積書・請求書などの帳票を作成したことがあるのではないでしょうか。
Excel はシンプルでとても便利な表計算ソフトです。でも、作成したファイルやデータの共有はあまり得意とはいえません。
また、複数のメンバーでリアルタイムに情報を更新することも苦手です。

本コースで解説するGoogle スプレッドシートは、「Google 版のExcel」と呼ばれることもあります。
最近では、Excel にはない新機能が次々と追加されており、業務効率を飛躍的に高めてくれるツールになっています。特に、複数のメンバーと情報共有をする、という利用シーンにおいては、Excelよりも優れているのかもしれません。

本コースでは、そんなGoogle スプレッドシートの「これだけは覚えておきたい！」という基本的な使い方と、業務効率を向上させることができるワンランク上の活用方法を丁寧に解説します。

今までExcelを使ってきてGoogleスプレッドシートに抵抗がある方、
「Googleアカウントってなに？クラウドってどういう仕組みなの？」と
不安に思っている方でも大丈夫！
今さら聞けないGoogleスプレッドシートの活用方法をじっくりと学習しましょう。


【スプレッドシートを使ってみよう】
「スプレッドシートとは」「Googleアカウントのログイン」といった基本的なことから説明します。
掛け算九九の表を使って、次のことを学びます。
・シートやファイルの基本操作
・キーボードショートカット
・四則演算
・相対参照 / 絶対参照 / 複合参照

【スプレッドシートの基本的な操作】
売上管理表を使って基本的な操作を体験します。
売上管理表を使って、次のことを学びます。
・シートの作成 / 削除
・シートの非表示 / 再表示
・キーボードのショートカット
・データ入力の基礎（文字 / 数字）
・合計を求める関数SUM
・文字装飾 / 書式の設定

【関数を使ってみよう】
請求書を作成するためにデータを入力し、入力したデータを見やすくするための操作を学びます。
また、請求書を作成しながら次の関数を学びます。
・SUM：合計を計算する
・TODAY：今日の日付を表示する　・NOW：現在の日時を表示する
・ROUND：四捨五入をする　・ROUNDUP：数字の切り上げをする　・ROUNDDOWN：数字の切り捨てをする
・IF：入力されたセルの条件によって処理を変える
・VLOOKUP：高度な参照を行う関数
・関数の中に関数を入れる

【データの検索／並び替え】
入力データの活用を行うための、データの検索や並び替えといったデータベース機能を学習します。
売上管理表を使って次の機能を学びます。
・フィルタ機能
・並べ替え機能
・データ探索機能：Google の（Google のAI がおすすめのグラフを提示してくれる）

【ピボットテーブルを使ってみよう】
ピボットテーブルの機能を活用して、集計表を作成します
日別・商品別売上集計表を使って次のことを学びます。
・ピボットテーブルエディタの解説
・集計行の並び替え
・集計行・列の変更
・フィルタの活用

【グラフを使ってみよう】
ピポットテーブルの集計データを使って、グラフの作成を行います。
グラフを作成することで次のことを学びます。
・グラフの新規作成
・グラフのカスタマイズ
・グラフの種類の解説

【スプレッドシートをもっと使いこなそう】
共同編集のために便利な機能をご紹介します。
次のことを学びます。
・データ入力を統一するための入力規則の設定
・入力エラーの設定（入力内容を保存させない）
・共同編集者との意思疎通のためのコメント機能 / メモ機能
・作成データをExcel 形式でダウンロードする方法


■■ 次のような方には受講は向きません ■■
Excel について学びたい方。
Excel でできる機能がスプレッドシートにないことが納得できない方。
target_audience: Google スプレッドシートに興味のある人
Google アカウントを活用したい人
Google スプレッドシートの基本操作を習得し、業務効率化を図りたいビジネスパーソン
Google スプレッドシートを利用したことはあるが、効率的な操作方法を1から学びなおしたい人
Google スプレッドシートを活用したワンランク上の情報処理を行いたい人
Excel の基本操作は網羅しているが、Googleスプレッドシートは利用したことがない人、これから活用するのが不安な人

Google Sheets, cloud based spreadsheets is very easy to learn and simple to operate, but on the same hand it's very powerful. Organisations across multiple sectors are widely using Google Sheets in their operations and hence for better career opportunities it is a must have skill in today’s digital era.
On completion of this course you will get strong operating knowledge of Google Sheets which will help you to implement Google Sheets in your day to day operations and you will also be able to work on important functions of Google Sheets which can be used to design different formulas to automate your manual tasks to boost your productivity.
What makes this course different from others is the animated content which will make your learning journey easy and extremely time saving.
If you are a working professional, learn Google Sheets skills and give value to your organisation and win in the workplace.
If you are a business owner, learn Google Sheets, upgrade your business with world class technology, put your business on autopilot mode and unlock your growth.
If you are a student, upgrade your knowledge with Google Sheets skills, be future ready and build the foundation of a successful career.

requirements: A Google Apps for Education account or a personal Gmail account
courses.description:
By the end of this course, you'll be able to use all of the features of Google Classroom to save yourself a ton of time, to stay super organized, and to improve collaboration between you and your students, guardians and even other teachers.


Overview: This course starts out with an overview of Google Classroom.


Sign In & Set Up: Next we'll move on to the basics of just signing in and getting Classroom set up.


Create, Enroll & Post: From there we'll talk about creating classes, enrolling students, posting assignments and other kinds of materials.


Track, Give Feedback & Grade: We'll look at tracking student work, then giving feedback on that work and then finally assigning a grade for the work.


Communicate: Near the end of the course we'll look at the communication features built into Google Classroom.


Use Extensions: And then finally we'll look at a couple of external apps that can be used to extend the power of Google Classroom.


This course is for teachers who find it difficult reading through the help sections for online software. Sometimes it is just so much easier if someone would just show you how to do the things that you want to do!
Also, you might have that feeling that there is so much more you could be doing with a tool like Google Classroom, but you´re just not sure how to get from where you are now -- up to that higher level of mastery.


If any of this is true for you as a teacher, who wants to either start using Google Classroom or perhaps improve on your current practise…


Then this course is definitely for you.


p.s. Finally, you might be a teacher who is now being faced with the difficult challenge of distance teaching and learning. This course will give you the complete toolbox for thriving as a teacher in this new reality!
target_audience: Educators of all kinds!

courses.description:
Google Sheets offers many of the features of traditional spreadsheet products and is becoming an extremely popular tool for data analysis and reporting.  Google Sheets makes it easy to setup and share data and information within the cloud.
In this course we explore one of the most powerful features of Google Sheets which is Pivot Tables.  You will learn how to easily create powerful Pivot Tables and Graphs using a few clicks of the mouse.
This course is primarily for people who want to learn how to get Google Sheets to do the work for them, without having to write complicated formulas or functions to achieve data analysis.


COURSE CONTENT AND OUTCOMES
Learn to correctly structure your data

I am a Udemy Instructor Partner with more than 20 years' experience in training & management consulting. Ecco il corso più completo su Google Drive, Documenti, Fogli, Presentazioni e Moduli, nel Cloud, in Italiano.
Questo corso copre ogni aspetto di ciascuna delle App Google della G-SUITE, per lavorare in cloud, in smartworking e / o in telelavoro.
Google ha creato un incredibile set di strumenti per la produttività dell'ufficio che chiunque può utilizzare gratuitamente!
Questo corso ti farà iniziare da zero, senza dare niente per scontato, parto dall'iscrizione iniziale e
ti farò imparare tutto, dalle basi alle tecniche più avanzate.
Se non hai mai utilizzato le app per ufficio di Google, questo corso fa al caso tuo.
Se sei già un po' "pratico" del pacchetto Office, questo corso probabilmente avrà ancora qualcosa di molto interessante per te.
Questo corso l'ho insegnato anche in sessioni dal vivo:
le persone che affermavano di sapere tutto ciò di cui avevano bisogno su Google Drive e le app per ufficio hanno affermato di aver appreso più di quanto pensavano....


Argomenti trattati da questo corso:


Drive: vantaggi, interfaccia, gestione dei file, condivisione di file, come ci si iscrive da zero gratis e molto altro!
Backup e Sincronizzazine automatici: vantaggi, come si installa, come puoi superare GRATIS più di 44 Gb, trucchi sulla banda e molto altro!
Documenti: impostazione del documento, interfaccia, menu, strumenti di modifica e molto altro!

Fogli: impostazione del documento, dati, grafici, formule e molto altro!

Corso MASTER 2022 con teoria ed esempi" è un percorso pratico e pragmatico per apprendere passo dopo passo attraverso 12 capitolo a padroneggiare questo potente strumento di lavorio della suite google. La prima sezione è un'introduzione al corso, alla metodologia di studio e alle risorse. La seconda sezione affronta tutte fondamenta del software, dal primo avvio all'anatomia di un progetto con google fogli. La terza sezione è invece interamente dedicata alla comprensione dei vari tipi di dati presenti in google fogli, conoscenza indispensabile per formattare nel migliore dei modi tabelle e strutture dato. Nella quarta sezione di affronta la formattazione delle celle per la creazione di layout efficaci ed efficiente. Il sesto capito è dedicato al cuore di google fogli, ovvero le formule e le funzioni, ovvero gli strumenti che ci permettono di rendere i nostri dati interessanti e produttivi. Nel capitolo sette invece andremo ad applicare formule e funzioni alle tabelle con esempi pratici e completi, sono alla sintesi dei dati attraverso le tabelle pivot. Il capitolo otto è invece interamente dedicato ai grafici, strumenti indispensabili per comunicare i risultati del proprio lavoro in modo visuale e diretto. Il capitolo nove è tutto incentrato sulla formattazione condizionata e la convalida dei dati, ovvero due strumento per dare velocità e dinamicità ai propri progetti e non solo. Nel capitolo dieci affrontiamo il lavoro in cloud, punto di forza degli strumenti in cloud di google, per il lavoro condiviso ed in tram. Il penultimo capitolo, l'undicesimo, invece presenta uno strumento ideale per automatizzare processi ripetitivo ovvero le macro. courses.description:
Learn by doing HANDS-ON, REAL-WORLD projects:


Google Docs - similar to Microsoft Word, learn by writing a resume
Google Sheets - similar to Microsoft Excel, learn by making business decisions in real business scenarios
Google Slides - similar to Microsoft Powerpoint - learn by creating presentations for work or video
Google Forms - useful for gathering customer feedback and surveys - learn by conducting a survey


FASCINATING COURSE PROJECTS


In each part of the course, you will learn by following a real-life project that is likely applicable to your work or business.
You'll get resume-writing skills, create and fully customize presentations for online video and work, see how SEO is managed through Google Docs and Google Sheets, and follow me as I use Google Sheets for a data-driven approach to making business strategy decisions.


GET FREE 15 GIGS OF CLOUD STORAGE FROM GOOGLE


I’ll show you how to take full advantage of Google’s free 15 GB of cloud storage to store your presentations, documents, and data securely.
Unlike other platforms (like Microsoft) where you have to pay a monthly fee for storage and for using their products, Google offers this powerful feature at no cost.


RESPONSIVE AND CARING INSTRUCTOR: WORLD-CLASS STUDENT SUPPORT


If you have questions, know that I am here to help! I answer 99% of student questions within 24 hours - OFTEN FASTER. Many students tell me that other instructors don't respond. Well, I do because
1) I care about my students.
2) I feel a responsibility to make sure that students get their money's worth from the course.


THE 4 TOOLS THAT POWER THE MODERN WORLD


Google Docs, Sheets, Slides, and Forms are simply the backbone of countless businesses worldwide. Entire companies run on these powerful, cost-effective platforms.
In this course, I’ll teach you everything from the basics to advanced techniques most people don’t know, so you can get the absolute most out of these tools.
You’ll be able to impress your boss, land new career opportunities, or manage your own business more efficiently. You’ll save time, work smarter, and open doors to endless possibilities in your career and personal projects.


1. GOOGLE DOCS - CREATE PROFESSIONAL DOCUMENTS WITH EASE

Google Docs is an intuitive word processor that lets you write, format, and share documents in real time. In this course, you’ll master:


Document creation: Craft and structure documents from scratch, using a range of formatting options.
Collaboration: Share your documents with colleagues or classmates and work together in real-time, using commenting, editing, and suggestion features.
Advanced features: Explore add-ons, templates, and shortcuts that can save you time and effort.
By the end of this module, you’ll be able to create professional, polished documents that can be accessed from any device, at any time.


2. GOOGLE FORMS - COLLECT FEEDBACK LIKE A PRO

Google Forms is the ultimate tool for surveys, quizzes, and data collection. In this section, you’ll learn:


Form creation: Design customized forms to gather information, feedback, or conduct surveys.
Data collection and analysis: Use multiple question types, and learn how to export your data for easy analysis in Google Sheets.
Automation: Set up automatic email notifications and responses, making the data collection process more streamlined and user-friendly.
Whether you're collecting customer feedback, running an event, or creating quizzes, Google Forms will allow you to manage data with ease.


3. GOOGLE SHEETS - MANAGE DATA WITH EASE

Google Sheets is an incredibly versatile spreadsheet tool that enables you to analyze, organize, and visualize data. In this section, you will:


Work with data: Learn how to input, format, and manipulate data in ways that make sense for your projects.
Formulas and functions: Understand basic to advanced formulas, including SUM, VLOOKUP, and IF statements, to automate calculations and data processing.
Data visualization: Create visually appealing charts and graphs to summarize your data effectively.
By mastering Google Sheets, you’ll have the ability to manage anything from simple lists to complex financial models.


4. GOOGLE SLIDES - CREATE STUNNING PRESENTATIONS

Google Slides allows you to build dynamic, visually engaging presentations. This section will cover:


Slide creation: Learn how to structure your presentation for clarity and impact, using text, images, and multimedia.
Design tips: Explore themes, templates, and visual effects to enhance your message.
Collaboration and delivery: Share your presentations with others and collaborate in real time, then deliver them smoothly with presenter tools.
By the end of this module, you'll be able to create compelling presentations that captivate your audience, whether in business meetings, academic settings, or public speaking events.


WHY THIS COURSE IS PERFECT FOR YOU


This course is designed for users of all levels. Whether you are new to Google Workspace or looking to deepen your knowledge, this course offers step-by-step guidance and practical applications of each tool. If you’re a professional looking to enhance productivity at work, a student aiming for higher academic efficiency, or a small business owner who needs to manage daily tasks more effectively, this course will help you unlock new capabilities within Google’s most-used tools.


EVEN IF YOU’RE ALREADY USING SOME OF THESE TOOLS, THERE’S SO MUCH MORE TO LEARN


Think you’ve mastered Google Workspace? Think again. I’ll show you advanced tricks and strategies that most people don’t even know exist. And you don’t need to be tech-savvy or spend hours learning—I’ve condensed the most important, useful information into short, actionable lessons you can complete in just 15 minutes a day. No more wasting time on confusing YouTube tutorials. This course gets straight to the point so you can work smarter and achieve more.


INSTRUCTOR BACKGROUND


I've been an entrepreneur for 20 years, have coached 1,000+ entrepreneurs in person, taught 850,000+ students online, and positively impacted millions of entrepreneurs worldwide, helping them create 6 and 7-figure businesses in the process, and I would love to help you.
I use Google Workspace tools daily in my own business, and I can confidently say they are essential for anyone looking to save time, stay organized, and boost productivity.
These tools are incredibly powerful, and with no cost involved, they help you save a lot while achieving professional results.
Let me show you how to make the most of them!


Key Benefits:


Real-World Applications: You will complete projects that simulate real-life tasks, making the learning practical and relevant to your needs.
Expand Your Creativity and Knowledge: You will be able to streamline your tasks, collaborate better with your team, and create professional-grade work with ease.
Lifetime Access: Access the course materials anytime, anywhere, ensuring you can revisit the content whenever you need a refresher.
Certification: Upon completion, you’ll receive a certificate that demonstrates your proficiency in using Google G Suite tools, giving you an edge in job applications or workplace advancements.


Invest in your future. Enroll today.

By the end of this course, educators will have a thorough understanding of how to leverage Google Classroom to create a dynamic and interactive learning environment that supports student success. As Tabelas Dinâmicas ou Pivot Tables são ferramentas que nos possibilitam trabalhar e analisar, de forma rápida, uma enorme quantidade de dados, onde podemos filtrar, ordenar e obter diversos resultados através dos dados disponíveis e de forma fácil. Graças a este novo recurso, o aplicativo Planilhas Google pode até ser usado como uma ferramenta de BI (ou Business Intelligence).
Então imagine aquela planilha enorme, com várias informações sobre vendas, clientes, etc..., com milhares de linhas. Utilizando as Tabelas Dinâmicas, podemos facilmente analisar esses dados.
Neste curso então, você irá aprender a usar as Tabelas Dinâmicas utilizando várias planilhas de exemplo que estarão disponíveis para você. Nela, você encontrará uma lista de projetos com algumas informações como: mês, ano, trimestre, valor orçado e valor pago. Com essas planilhas você irá obter resultados que permite ter um excelente entendimento do recurso tabelas dinâmicas.

Coloquei essa observação porquê as pessoas confundem, assistir as aulas e ter a capacidade fazer o que elas quiserem e num estalo de dedos ter a capacidade de fazer qualquer coisa.
CADA APLICAÇÃO É DIFERENTE UMA DA OUTRA. CADA APLICAÇÃO TEM SUA PECULIARIDADE ENTÃO MUITA COISA QUE VOCÊ VERA AQUI, PODE SER QUE NÃO SEJA USADA NO SEU APP, MAS O CONCEITO É QUASE TODO O MESMO. ENTENDAM ISSO!!!

Em algumas aulas, infelizmente o áudio não ficou legal, eu estou buscando um software ou até mesmo planejando uma nova aula para melhorar esse conteúdo, então os alunos que não sabem absolutamente nada acabam ligando uma coisa com a outra e avaliam mal o curso.

courses.description:
Welcome to The Complete Google Forms Course. This course will teach you to understand how to design, share, and analyze questionnaires and quizzes created on the Google application Google Forms.
Google Forms is a free survey tool that allows you to easily and efficiently collect information. It is used in both professional and personal settings, whether it is for collecting time availability from your employees or for gathering t-shirt sizes for a family vacation shirt. It supports various types of questions and allows for validation options to control data entry. Although it has a fairly simple user interface, it offers many advantages and can perform a multitude of tasks.
As a complete Google Forms course, this course will start with the foundation and design aspects. The lessons from this section include understanding how to add questions, utilizing response validations, customizing headers, and more. In addition, there are a couple of quick wins scattered across the sections to provide more tips on how to use this application to its fullest potential.
The second section of this course goes over how to view and analyze the received form responses. With Google Forms’ powerful data analysis, this application is a go-to tool for many businesses, organizations, and classrooms. Since you have full configuration over the form, you are able to decide exactly how you want the form to look and what information you want it to collect.
Google Forms is highly recommended by many for educational purposes. The third section goes over how to transform an ordinary form into a self-grading quiz with just one button. It also talks about how to add answer feedback and create a point system to help alleviate the stress of administering and grading.
Google Forms is a powerful application that allows you to create surveys to easily collect an ambulance of diverse types of information. This course will also show you how to send out forms to collect data from the comforts of your own home. Some of the many things that you can make on Google Forms include:
Job application, time off request, customer feedback
Contact information, event RSVP
Exit ticket, quizzes, course evaluation, etc
Enroll to learn how to use Google Forms to create surveys and quizzes!
target_audience: Anyone interested in learning Google Forms

courses.description:
Descubre el poder de Google Looker Studio y crea dashboards que impresionen a cualquiera
¿Quieres dominar una de las herramientas más potentes para crear informes visuales y dashboards interactivos?
Este curso es para ti.
Looker Studio (antes conocido como Data Studio) te permite transformar datos en informes visuales fáciles de entender y compartir. En este curso, te enseñaré paso a paso cómo sacar el máximo partido a esta herramienta, sin importar tu nivel de experiencia.
¿Qué aprenderás?
Empezaremos con Google Sheets como fuente de datos por su accesibilidad, pero no nos quedaremos ahí.
Exploraremos también cómo conectar Looker Studio con otras fuentes como BigQuery, y verás cómo crear paneles profesionales que dejen a tus jefes, clientes o compañeros… ¡con la boca abierta!

- Integración con BigQuery
- Descarga de datos por parte del usuario
- Programación de envíos y formas de compartir tus informes
- Trucos y consejos prácticos que yo mismo uso a diario
Este curso es 100% práctico. Te animo a seguir los ejercicios, practicar con tus propios datos y experimentar mientras avanzas. Nada de teoría innecesaria: irás aplicando cada conocimiento al instante.
¿Por qué este curso?
Porque está pensado para ayudarte a aprender rápido, aplicarlo desde el primer momento y destacar con tus dashboards.
Más de 9.000 alumnos ya han confiado en él. Echa un vistazo a sus valoraciones y comentarios: ellos son la mejor prueba de lo que aprenderás aquí.

courses.description:
Google Apps is a suite of apps which offers a free alternative to Microsoft Office or Microsoft Office 365, respectively. Each Google Apps corresponds to a product you might already know:
Gmail (= Microsoft Outlook)
Calendar (=Microsoft Outlook Calendar)
Hangouts (= Skype)
Drive (= Drop Box)
Docs (= Microsoft Word)
Sheets (= Microsoft Excel)
Presentations (= Microsoft Power Point)

The course is addressed to everyone who is new to Google Apps, or to Google Apps for Work which is a corporate version of Google Apps.
Especially if you used to work with Microsoft Office or Outlook this course might help you to overcome your initial difficulties. I will show you all essential DO's and DONT's.
The course is divided into 47 short lectures - each of them providing all necessary information about a topic but not wasting time in repetitions. My motivation for the course was to pass on my own experiences I had when being new to Google Apps.
I want you to save time and avoid fears of contact which I had myself. Further, I will pass on some tips and tricks which took me some time to discover but which provide very useful shortcuts for your daily work.
When I worked for a multinational company we have switched from Microsoft Exchange to Google Apps and I trained quite a few colleagues in how to use Google Apps. I have got to know all stumbling blocks but also all the great advantages which Google Apps will bring to you.
This course will guide you step by step through the single apps and explain how they interact with each other.
Now enjoy and have fun!
target_audience: Users who are new to Google Apps or Google Apps for Work
Also users who used to work with Microsoft Outlook or Microsoft Office

courses.description:
This comprehensive course is meticulously designed to equip users with the essential skills and knowledge to effectively utilize Google Chat and Google Meet. These two powerful applications have been developed to replace and significantly enhance the functionalities previously available in Hangouts, offering a more robust and versatile communication experience.


Throughout this course, students will delve into the intricacies of both Google Chat and Google Meet. They will start by exploring the fundamental features of Google Chat, learning how to send direct messages to individuals, and creating group chats for team collaboration. The course will cover best practices for managing conversations, organizing chats, and utilizing advanced features such as bots and integrations to streamline workflows and boost productivity.


In addition to mastering Google Chat, students will gain a thorough understanding of Google Meet. They will learn how to initiate, join, and schedule meetings with ease, ensuring they can connect with colleagues and clients seamlessly. The course will provide step-by-step instructions on how to use various meeting controls, such as muting participants, managing screen layouts, and recording sessions for future reference.


A significant portion of the course will be dedicated to teaching students how to share their desktops and applications within a meeting. This skill is crucial for presentations, collaborative work, and troubleshooting technical issues in real time. Students will practice sharing their screens, switching between different applications, and ensuring their shared content is clear and accessible to all meeting participants.


By the end of this course, students will be proficient in using Google Chat and Google Meet to enhance their communication and collaboration efforts. They will be well-prepared to leverage these tools to improve their productivity, foster better teamwork, and achieve their professional goals. Whether for personal use or within a corporate environment, the skills acquired in this course will be invaluable.

Teaching our students is our job and we are committed to it. If you have any questions about the course content, Google Data Studio, Data Visualization, practice sheet or anything related to any topic, you can always post a question in the course or send us a direct message.
What is covered in this course?
This course covers everything you need to create insightful and dynamic reports using Google Data Studio in the professional work place.
Below are the course contents of this complete and concise course on Google Data studio:
Introduction - In this section, the structure and the contents of the course are discussed. We also discuss the reason to why should we learn Google Data Studio.
Theoretical concepts - This lecture covers the prerequisite understanding of key terminologies and concepts before we start to work on Google Data Studio.
All charts and tables in Data Studio - We cover all the available chart types one-by-one. It includes Data tables, scorecards, bar charts, time series, pie charts, GeoMaps, pivot tables and many more.
Data filter controls - This lecture covers the filtering options that can be given to the report viewers so that each viewer can filter the data and see only what s/he wants to see.
Branding the report - Branding a report is a very popular business practice and we will see how we can do it using brand logo and brand colors
Embedding external content - We can add videos, quizzes, feedback forms, company websites to our report. Yes! It is possible. We will see how in this section.
Blending multiple data sets - Real life data is in multiple tables. To plot a graph using data from multiple tables requires data blending. Very Important Section.
Report Sharing and Collaborating - This section covers ways in which you can give viewing or editing rights to others. You can also schedule regular reports to the management using Google Data Studio. Report sharing is something where no other Data Visualization tool can beat Google Data Studio.
And so much more!
By the end of this course, your confidence in using Google data studio for data visualisation will soar. You'll have a thorough understanding of how to use Google Data Studio for creating insightful dashboards and beautiful reports.
Go ahead and click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1 of this Google Data Studio course!
Cheers
Start-Tech Academy


FAQ's
What you can do with Data Studio?
Visualize your data through highly configurable charts and tables.
Easily connect to a variety of data sources.
Share your insights with your team or with the world.
Collaborate on reports with your team.
Speed up your report creation process with built-in sample reports.
Is Google Data Studio free to use?
Google Data Studio is offered completely free by Google.
What is the use of Google Data Studio?
Google Data Studio gives you everything you need to turn your client's analytics data into informational, easy-to-understand reports through data visualization. The reports are easy to read, easy to share and even customizable to each of your clients
The Authors of this course have several years of corporate experience and hence have curated the course material keeping in mind the requirement of Google Data Studio and Data visualization techniques in today's corporate world.

courses.title: Simple Steps to Declutter Your Gmail
courses.bio: I show you step-by-step simple ways to keep your Gmail inbox organised, more manageable, and free of clutter!
objectives: Take quick actions to immediately reduce the number of emails in your inbox

How is your Gmail inbox looking right this minute?
Is it full of unread emails that just stress you out as soon as you log in?
Feeling overwhelmed by your emails is a common issue and if you don’t put processes in place or use the techniques to help manage it, then your emails will end up eating into your family time, your relaxation time and you’ll just end up not switching off at all.
The good news is that it’s not too late to get on top of your emails and I want to help you do just that :)
I've been using Gmail for what feels like forever, and I keep my own inbox organised and decluttered in both my personal and business email accounts, by using the processes that I show you in this course.


So, this course is split into 3 parts:


Instant Decluttering... these are things you can do straight away that will have an immediate effect on the number of emails currently in your inbox.


Keeping Order... is all to do with maintaining your inbox. You'll learn the processes to help you manage the number of emails coming in daily and keeping your inbox organised.


Additional Tips... is where I show you a few more tips & tricks that involve free tools available in your Gmail that might help you stay a bit more organised.



What you will learn
Please note this is NOT a course about reaching inbox zero, however you will learn:
the techniques to help you declutter your inbox without losing important information.
the systems needed to automatically organise incoming emails.
the different inbox layouts, what they each do and how you can customise them to work in a way that works for you.


No fluff. No overwhelm. Just actionable steps to free up your time, reduce mental clutter, and help you focus on what matters most.

requirements: Grundwissen über die Funktion von Suchmaschinen
courses.description:
Lerne was Keywords sind und wie du die richtigen Keywords für deine Webseite mit kostenlosen und kostenpflichtigen Tools recherchieren kannst
Hinweis: Komplett neue Videos und neue Inhalte!
Keywords sind die Begriffe, die von Usern in die Suchmaske einer Suchmaschine eingegeben werden. Es gibt sehr viele Suchmaschinen, im deutschsprachigen Raum ist jedoch Google mit einer Reichweite von 90% der quasi-Monopolist. Wenn wir von Suchmaschinenoptimierung sprechen, sprechen wir deshalb fast immer von Google-Optimierung.
Das Google-Ranking erfolgt mithilfe von Algorithmen. Dieser versucht die Relevanz einer Suchanfrage mit Hilfe von Hunderten von Faktoren zu bestimmen und Google arbeitet ständig an der Verbesserung des Algorithmus.
In diesem Crash-Kurs lernst du die Grundlagen der SEO-Keyword-Recherche kennen. Ich zeige dir in den folgenden Einheiten alles was du wissen musst, um die richtigen Themen für deine Webseite oder deinen Blog zu finden.
Du lernst:
Was Keywords sind
Warum Suchmaschinenoptimierung fast immer Google-Optimierung ist
Welche Arten von Keywords es gibt
Für welche Keywords du optimieren solltest
Wie du bei der Keywordrecherche vorgehen solltest
Welche Tools du bei der Keywordrecherche verwenden kannst (Kostenpflichtig und kostenlos)
Wie du die Keywords auf deiner Webseite am besten einbaust
Welche Rolle die Suchintention spielt
Was Long-Tail-Keywords sind und wie du sie verwendest
Wofür Wdf*IDF wichtig ist
Mit Hilfe dieses Kurs, wirst du sofort bessere Themen für deine Webseite finden und deine Sichtbarkeit steigern können.
Ich freue mich darauf, dich im Kurs zu sehen!
Philipp!
target_audience: SEO-Anfänger
Blogger
Content Manager
Agentur Mitarbeiter
Webmaster
Website-Betreiber
Marketing Manager
Online-Entrepreneurs

Are you tired of the yearly $100 drain on your pocket for Office 365? Well, here's a money-saving gem for you – Google Docs. It's completely free with a Google Account, and guess what? That account is free too! No more reaching for your wallet every year. In this course, I'll guide you through the ins and outs of Google Docs, sharing my five years of experience using it without a single complaint.
This isn't a high-stakes sales pitch; it's more like a casual chat over a cup of coffee. Over the course of 1 hour and 30 minutes, we'll explore every nook and cranny of Google Docs as of April 2020. No tech jargon, no pressure, just a down-to-earth guide on how to breeze through menus and make the most of Google Docs.
Worried about losing your documents? Fear not – Google Docs stores everything online, saving you from the chaos of a cluttered desktop. So, not only will you be saving some hard-earned cash, but you'll also be typing away more efficiently. If you're keen on mastering Google Docs without the formalities, consider this course your laid-back ticket to tech ease. Let's keep it real and straightforward – join me for a session where learning meets simplicity!

requirements: Access to a computer and the internet.
courses.description:
Email still remains an important channel of communication and it's likely you check your email every day.
But, if your like most people, despite so much time being spent checking email you've never put enough time aside to learn the features, tip and tricks that your email provider has to offer.
Why?
Because your busy and...
Honestly, email providers like Gmail work well enough out of the box not to bother.
But, here's the catch and the question you should ask yourself.
What's the cost?
When you stop and think about it, it’s actually pretty obvious: having a giant list of pending messages in your face all the time isn’t an effective method of organization.
How often do you lose track of emails or realize you never got around to taking care of something you meant to handle several days ago?
Being visually overwhelmed tends to lead to those sorts of issues rather than efficiency.
That doesn’t mean you have to answer every email immediately, of course. For most of us, that’d be impractical. It just means you have to make it your goal to deal with your email.
And, that's what this course does.
It teaches you the ins and outs of Gmail.
It teaches you organization.
It teaches you the features where you save a bit of time every day which snowballs into weeks and even months saved over the course of your lifetime.
Your time and attention are finite and this course teaches you ways to sort, categorize and automate your emails so you can spend more time on the most important issues in your life or doing what you love rather than having to constantly worry about your cluttered inbox.
So, sure, you can choose to NOT BUY this course and move on.
But before you do, ask yourself...
Whats the cost?
target_audience: Students who are new to Gmail.
People who seek control over their inbox.
Anyone who wishes to be more productive.
People who feel they want to get more organized in handling of their email.

requirements: There are no prerequisites for this course. Anyone with a basic understanding of computers and internet usage can take this course.
courses.description:
In today’s data-driven world, proficiency with tools like Google Sheets is essential for success. Whether you're a professional, student, or entrepreneur, the ability to manage, analyze, and collaborate on data can significantly improve productivity. Google Sheets Beginners Guide 2025 is designed to help you quickly learn and master the fundamental skills you need to create, edit, format, and analyze spreadsheets with ease.
This course is a comprehensive guide to Google Sheets, starting from the very basics and progressing to intermediate-level skills. With hands-on lessons, practical examples, and clear instructions, you'll be equipped to handle all the essential functions in Google Sheets with confidence.
Course Highlights:

Interactive Quizzes: Test your knowledge after each module and reinforce your learning.

Final Practice Test: Apply your skills to real-world spreadsheet scenarios with a comprehensive final exam.

Assignments: Complete practical assignments designed to help you apply your new skills in different contexts.

Why This Course Matters:
Google Sheets is one of the most widely used tools for managing data, from basic lists to complex reports. This course will help you become proficient in navigating Google Sheets and using its wide range of features to improve your data management, analysis, and collaboration skills. Whether you’re managing personal finances, analyzing sales data, or working on group projects, this course will empower you to use Google Sheets to its fullest potential.
The course also highlights the collaboration features, which allow users to share, comment, and review spreadsheets seamlessly—an essential skill for modern workflows.


What Makes This Course Stand Out?
Unlike other Google Sheets tutorials that focus only on features, this course blends practical skills with real-life applications. You'll not only learn how to create and format spreadsheets but also gain the knowledge to analyze data effectively, perform calculations, and work collaboratively in a shared environment.
By the end of this course, you will be able to:


Navigate Google Sheets and access its various features confidently.

Create, edit, and format spreadsheets for diverse purposes.

Perform essential calculations, including averages, sums, and conditional formulas.

Visualize data using charts and pivot tables.

Collaborate effectively with others using sharing, commenting, and version control features.

This Course Includes the Following Sections
1. Introduction to Google Sheets
Get familiar with the interface, core features, and key use cases of Google Sheets. Learn how it's used in managing, analyzing, and collaborating on data.
2. Creating and Managing a Spreadsheet
Master the basics: create, rename, move, copy, and delete spreadsheets. Understand how to structure your workspace for clarity and productivity.
3. Editing Spreadsheets
Learn how to add, delete, and move data within cells. Customize sheet tabs, add images and hyperlinks, and work with rows and columns for better organization.
4. Viewing a Spreadsheet
Organize and analyze data using filters, sorting, hiding, and freezing rows or columns. Learn how to improve readability and control how data is displayed.
5. Formatting & Printing a Spreadsheet
Discover how to format cells with fonts, colors, currency, and borders. Learn conditional formatting, layout settings, and how to prepare spreadsheets for print.
6. Working with Spreadsheet Data
Dive into key productivity features: use formulas and functions like IF, VLOOKUP, create charts and pivot tables to analyze and present your data effectively.
7. Collaboration with Google Sheets
Learn how to collaborate in real-time, share documents, add comments, and manage version history to track changes and improve teamwork.
Start learning today with the Google Sheets Beginner Course—and transform the way you work with data.


Enroll now and take control of your spreadsheets.
target_audience: Absolute beginners looking for an organized, engaging, enjoyable, and practical Google Sheets education.
This Google Sheets course is designed for new and intermediate spreadsheet users who wish to learn Google Sheets and spreadsheets!
Spreadsheet users of all levels, including those who want to learn spreadsheets for personal use!
If you are an experienced data analyst or strong spreadsheet user, you should not take this course.
Students who wish to pursue a career in management consulting or technology operations!

requirements: グーグルサイト（無料）
グーグルアナリティクス
G Suite（任意）
courses.description:
Googleサイトは、HTMLやCSSのようなマークアップランゲージ（プログラミングみたいなもの）を一切必要としません。カーソルを移動させながら、必要なコンテンツを必要な場所に配置するだけです。直感的に、しかも簡単にウェブサイトを作ることができます。
Googleサイトは慣れちゃえばすごい簡単です。僕の場合であれば、成約率をそれほど期待しない簡易的なLP（ランディングページ）を作るときや、高額でない（3万円以下）の情報商品の会員サイトを作るときに利用しています。GoogleサイトのユーザーというかフリーランスとしてG Suiteを導入している人が少ないので、日本語の解説ページが全くありません。公式ページは文字ばっかりでわかりにくいですし。
今回、受講生の方から「簡単に作れる会員サイトってありますか？」と質問をいただいてので、このコースを作りました。はい、このコースはGoogleサイトの使い方についてのものです。
さて、Googleサイトの良い点を羅列しましょう。
超簡単にサイトが作れる
広告なし（Googleアドセンスを貼ってもよい）
完全無料
G Suiteの別アプリとの相性がよい
今度は悪い点。
SEOに強いかどうかは不明（僕が検索エンジンで見かけたのは1回だけです）
プログラムが動きません（JSやPHPをゴリゴリ使いたい人には不向き）
会員管理ができない
デザインがWordPress Themeに比べてかっこよくない
まあ無料ですからね。あんまり文句は言えない。使う機会を見極めて、ピンポイントで使うと良いです。僕の場合は、繰り返しになりますが、簡易なLPやフロントエンド商品の提供場所として利用しています。「うわ、もうできた」ってくらいのスピードで完成しますので。
まずは受講してみてください。使えそうだなと思ったら、講義を見ながら一緒に手を動かして見てください。1つのコースが終わる頃には、あなたのサイトが完成しています。

courses.title: Learning Google Meet from Scratch
courses.bio: Conduct Online Meetings Easily
objectives: Google Meet
Online Meetings
Collaboration
Teamwork
requirements: Basic Computer Knowledge
courses.description:
Google Meet is a very powerful online meeting application that lets you easily conduct online meetings with different people and collaborate with them.
In this course we're going to get started by learning how to access Google Meet and explore its interface.
Then we will see how we can start and add other participants in the meeting and see how we can join in other meetings. We will see how we can accept and reject participants in a meeting and will also see meeting scheduling features.
After that, we will see the meeting layout options and then also see how we can pin and mute participants as a host. We will then see the screen sharing options that will allow us to present visually to other participants. Also, we will see how to apply visual effects in the video stream.
Then, we will explore the file sharing options and will also see how we can collaboratively work in real time with other participants by starting a whiteboard.
To increase the functionality of Google Meet, then we will see how we can use various extensions as well.
In the end, we will see how we can work with audio and video settings to set the quality if audio and video as we want and also see the controls we have as a host. And then we will see how we can set caption language and then wrap up the course.
target_audience: Beginners

courses.title: ゼロから業務ダッシュボードを作れる！ データの可視化を武器にしたい人のためのLooker Studio講座
courses.bio: 基本的な機能（データ接続、データの準備、グラフ、コントロール、共有）から応用的な内容（データ統合、データ抽出、比較計算・関数、パラメータ、メールアドレスフィルタ、コミュニティビジュアライゼーション）まで
objectives: Googleが提供するダッシュボード作成ツール、Looker Studioで業務上利用するダッシュボードが作成できるようになります。
ダッシュボード作成までの全体の流れと、「何をダッシュボードに含めるべきか」、「どのような構成とするべきか」が理解できます

requirements: コース受講の要件や前提条件は以下の2つです。1) インターネットに接続できるPC、2) Googleアカウント
courses.description:
前提知識がゼロから業務上のダッシュボードをLooker Studioで作成できるようになるコースです。

---
2023年4月にLooker Studioに実装された以下の機能強化をカバーしています。
グラフ種類にサンキーダイアグラムが登場
コントロールに「ボタン」が追加
いくつかのグラフに「ズーム」と「パン」追加
スコアカードの機能強化
---

以下を特徴としています。


扱うグラフの網羅性の高さ：14種類すべてのグラフの作成方法を取り上げています
扱う機能の網羅性の高さ：基本的な機能の説明に加え、応用的な内容も取り上げています
すべてのレクチャーにスライド：77のすべてのレクチャーにスライドを用意しています
再現性：本講座には多数のデモがありますが、受講生が再現できるようデータをエクセルで添付してます
練習問題：主要グラフと位置づけた5つのグラフをテーマとした練習問題で習熟度合いを確認できます。
熟練の講師：講師には他にGA(UAとGA4）、Tableau、Tableau Prep、SQLをテーマにした講座があります
Googleが力を入れていること、また、無料であり採用ハードルが低いことから、今後、Looker Studio（旧Googleデータポータル）を社内のデータの可視化・共有基盤として採用する企業は増えていくと考えられます。したがって、各企業においては、Looker Studioのレポート作成についてスキルをもった社員を育成したいニーズがあると考えています。


本講座は、そうしたLooker Studioでデータの可視化をできる人材に対する育成ニーズに対応しています。


また、社員の側からも、Looker Studioへの習熟を契機として、組織内で「データに強い人材」というポジションを確立していくことは、キャリア上もプラスなことと思います。本講座は、「前提知識ゼロ」からLooker Stuidoを学習していただけるため、学習開始のハードルは低いでしょう。


講師が実演したデモを受講生側で再現できるよう、11種類のデータをエクセルで提供しています。Looker Studioの習熟には実際に手を動かすことが必須です。そうしたときに「適当なデータがない」という問題は、本講座では発生しません。

内容的には、基本的な項目はもちろんしっかり押さえていますが、独学や見様見真似でレポートを作成する人との差別化ができるよう、11章に応用的な内容を用意しました。（11章だけで2時間も尺があるのはそのためです。）ぜひ、本講座を受講して「データの可視化」を武器にしてください。
target_audience: 「データ分析」や「データの可視化」をキャリア上の自分の武器としたいビジネスマンの方

requirements: None
This course is designed for non-"tech savvy" students
courses.description:
In this "Google Entrepreneurship Fundamentals" course, we will arm you with the tools you need to start a successful business.
In this beginner training course, we are going to show you how to use 5 of the free tools that Google offers to plan & manage your new startup business. The free tools we will cover in this module are: Google Mail, Contacts, Calendar, Drive & Keep
Our course is designed for the beginner entrepreneur and structured in a way that will teach you how to use Google's tools even if you are not tech savvy. Our team are professional trainers, our videos are professionally made and you can expect a high quality training experience.
In each of these modules, we will teach you why these are the perfect tools for an entrepreneur, the advantages of using them, how to navigate the tools and how to use them effectively.
_________________________________________________________________________________________
MODULES:
Google Mail (also known as Gmail)
Gmail is a very powerful application, although a lot of its features are not immediately obvious.
It is important to Remember that Google is an ecosystem, and as far as we are concerned, Gmail is the centerpiece to this ecosystem.
To make sure you are not overwhelmed by the vast amount of emails that can accumulate within Gmail and to keep your business running as efficiently as possible, our course is designed to help you establish a new way of thinking about how you approach running your business with Gmail.


Google Contacts
Google Contacts is a relatively straightforward and simple application, but if leveraged properly can have a powerful impact on any business.
In this module we will teach you how to create new detailed contacts and manage your business contact list, as well as how to ensure you can access that list from anywhere, on any device, at any time.


Google Calendar
Google Calendar is the primary application that will become the heart of your business and is a far more effective tool for managing a business than it may look on the surface.
It will allow you to plan your business’ time effectively, from scheduling out your day and planning meetings, to coordinating your employees and managing interactions with your clients.
In this module we will teach you everything you need to know to make Google Calendar your daily time & task management application.


Google Drive
Managing your files in a new business (from new clients proposals to supplier invoices) can be a daunting task if you don’t know how.
For businesses today, accessibility and collaboration are essential to success, so knowing how to use Google Drive effectively will not only change how you do business, but save you countless hours of admin
In this module, we teach you how to navigate Google Drive, how to create, upload, download, edit and share files with your team, your suppliers and your clients. We will also show you how to backup your data, how to use Drive to ensure your ideas are kept safe and how to attach files in other Google apps directly from Google Drive.


Google Keep
Keep is simple application that mimics real world sticky notes.
Designed to work on your mobile phone so you can take notes quickly on the fly, it can be used for everything from making a quick shopping list to jotting down evolving ideas for a business project.
Used effectively it will become an incubator for your best ideas, projects, goals and plans.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs
Freelancers
Anyone looking to start their own business
Anyone looking for a more effective and cost efficient way of managing their business

Google is known for many things. Their search engine, smart devices, and even new technology. But Google is also known for its unique variation on the average company rules and principles. Google receives over 1,500,000 applicants for jobs each year. This course will tell you why. It's not just the bean bags and free food.
Learn how to learn from your best employees... and your worst. Higher people who are smarter than you. And pay unfairly (It's actually fairer!)
Anyone can apply these rules in their lifestyle no matter their profession or age. Best course for anyone in the workforce, whether you're a CEO or employee.


In this course, you will learn:

courses.description:
※2023年5月新レクチャー追加「AIを使って1分以内にスライドを作る方法」




あなたはこのような悩みを抱えていませんか？


「Powerpoint（パワーポイント）の使い方がよくわからない」
「無料でスライド（プレゼン資料）を作りたい」
「しょぼいスライドしか作れなくて悩んでいる」
「スライドのデザインが苦手」


Googleスライドの使い方をマスターすれば、パソコン苦手な初心者でもカンタンにプロ並みのスライドを作ることができます。


会社のプレゼンでスライド資料を作らないといけないサラリーマンの人や、
洗練されたスライドが作れず悩んでいるUdemy講師の人などにおすすめのツールが「Googleスライド」です。


GoogleスライドはPowerpointと違って完全無料で利用することができます。


使い方も非常にシンプルで操作も簡単なので、
初心者の人でもカンタンに使いこなすことができます。


この講座ではGoogleスライドのありとあらゆる機能が学べます。
（どのようなことが学べるかはイントロダクションをご覧ください）


僕自身スライド作成が苦手でしょぼいデザインのスライドしか作れずに悩んでいた時期があります。


でもそれは「Googleスライドの正しい使い方や便利な機能を知らなかったから」です。


イントロダクションの動画を見てもらえばわかりますが、
ショボいスライドしか作れなかった僕でもプロ顔負けのスライドが作れるようになりました。


この講座では以下のようなことが学べます。


アニメーションの操作方法
ダイアグラム（フローチャート・タイムラインなど）の挿入方法
おしゃれなタイトル画面の作り方

スライドにナレーションを入れる方法


詳しくはイントロダクション（一番最初）の動画をご覧ください。


洗練されたスライドを作るのは決して難しくありません。


この講座でGoogleスライドのすべてを学べば、
もうPowerpointを使う必要ありません。


Googleスライドをマスターすれば、
サラリーマンの人はプレゼン資料を作るのが楽しくなり、

requirements: A Introdução ao Google Workspace não existe um pré-requisito pois estaremos ensinando inicio a fim todas as configurações.
Não é necessário ter experiência com a plataforma. Você aprenderá tudo o que precisa durante o curso pois preparei um curso onde faremos juntos cada exercício proposto.
Durante o curso iremos implementar e configurar do zero a plataforma Google Workspace.

Para não gerar custos iremos utilizar a versão de avaliação de 30 dias para treinamento, nossas aulas terão uma visão profissional de implementação e gerenciamento. Preparei um senário profissional onde receberemos diversos e-mail do nosso CEO, solicitando implementação e configurações dentro da plataforma.
courses.description:
Bem-vindo ao curso Introdução ao Google Workspace. Ao se inscrever neste curso, iremos ensinar os fundamentos da administração do Google Workspace assim você será capaz de configurar e gerenciar a ferramenta trabalhando de uma nova forma colaborativa usando o Google Workspace. Você e sua equipe podem começar a usar o Gmail, Agenda, Drive, google sala de aula, outros serviços essenciais do Google Workspace.
O que é o Google Workspace?
O Google Workspace é um pacote de serviços baseados na nuvem que pode fornecer à sua empresa ou escola uma maneira totalmente nova de trabalhar em conjunto online - não apenas usando e-mail e bate-papo, mas por meio de videoconferências, mídia social, colaborações de documentos em tempo real e mais.
O que esperar durante este curso de treinamento?
Durante este curso de treinamento, você verá uma série de lições que o guiarão pelas ferramentas, recursos e processos fundamentais que você usará como administrador do Google Workspace. Este curso pretende ser uma introdução a essas ferramentas. As lições deste curso incluem exercícios práticos e links úteis da base de conhecimento.


Custos
Recomendamos que ao iniciar o curso, você se inscreverá para uma conta de teste do Google Workspace. Cada conta do Google Workspace requer pelo menos um domínio registrado. Você pode comprar  o domínio como parte do fluxo de inscrição, portanto, você o adquirirá. Se você já possui um domínio, pode usá-lo, mas observe que as instruções aqui pressupõem que você está adquirindo o domínio como parte do processo de inscrição. Este curso introdutório não ensina como associar um domínio existente ao Google Workspace, embora forneçamos links para a Central de Ajuda do Google Workspace, que documenta os requisitos e o processo e também disponibilizo um aula sobre como realizar este procedimento.
A conta de teste é válida por 14 dias em algumas versões e 30 dias na educacional. Nenhuma cobrança pelo Google Workspace é até o fim desse período. Você deve certificar-se de CANCELAR SUA ASSINATURA antes do término do período de avaliação para evitar e cobranças caso escolha versões pagas. Isso é muito IMPORTANTE, então não se esqueça!

Mais fique tranquilo iremos utilizar uma versão do Google Workspace que nos fornece 30 dias gratuitos sem a necessidade de inserir informações de pagamento como cartão de credito ou algo do tipo.
target_audience: Este curso e voltado a profissionais Coorporativos,  área da educação, professores, gestores escolares, entusiasta de tecnologia e principalmente para  profissionais da área  de TI, que busca conhecimento e aperfeiçoamento profissional.
Composto de 7 módulos, todos os módulos são compostos por exercícios práticos seguindo uma linha de raciocínio do ambiente e demandas do dia a dia.
Iniciante no mundo Google Workspace ou até mesmo profissionais com vivencia nesta plataforma vai aprender recursos e boas praticas de gerenciamento valiosas.

Não tem como não aprender, preparei uma trilha de aprendizado clara de exercícios para configurar o domínio do Google Workspace, criar uma nova conta, fazer login no console de administração pela primeira vez e personalizar o perfil da sua empresa, configurar permissões, usuários, grupos, recursos, agenda, diretórios, Unidade Organizacionais, funções personalizadas etc.

courses.description:
Google Keep is a free web-based note-taking tool by Google. In this course, we will be covering the basics of Google Keep and learning how we can take notes and manage them effectively.
We will learn by starting to be familiar with the Google Keep interface and then learning how we can keep, modify, and update notes. Also, we will learn how we can collaborate with others in notes that we keep and then add pictures and drawings to the notes as well.
After that, we will learn how to duplicate notes and learn how we can copy the contents of our notes to Google Docs. Also, we will learn how we can have easy access to Google Keep directly from other Google Applications.
Then, we will also see how we can use some tricks to modify the text looks of our notes and how we can capture text from pictures and utilize different extensions to increase the functionality of Google Keep.
We will also see how we can archive notes and retrieve archived notes. And then we will see how we can change the settings of Google Keep as well to let the application behave the way we want.
In the end, we will wrap up the course with an example project.
target_audience: Beginner

requirements: No prior experience or knowledge is required. This course is designed for beginners and experienced users alike.

courses.description:
Mastering Google Chrome: Unleash the Power of Effortless Browsing" is a comprehensive and in-depth course designed to equip learners of all levels with the knowledge and skills needed to become proficient users of Google Chrome, the world's leading web browser. In this course, we delve into every aspect of Chrome, from essential setup and customization to advanced features and productivity hacks, providing a holistic understanding of the browser's capabilities.
Through a series of engaging lessons and hands-on activities, you will discover how to maximize your browsing experience and unlock the full potential of Chrome. We will guide you through essential topics such as setting up Chrome on various devices, personalizing the browser interface, and managing bookmarks, history, and extensions to suit your needs.
Privacy and security are paramount, and we will explore techniques to protect your online presence, including utilizing incognito mode, managing cookies, and configuring advanced privacy settings. You will gain confidence in your ability to browse the web safely and securely.
Searching the web effectively is a fundamental skill, and we will delve into powerful search techniques and shortcuts, enabling you to find information quickly and efficiently. You will learn how to leverage advanced search operators, utilize Google's time-saving features, and perform targeted searches for specific content types.
The course also covers file and tab management, teaching you how to organize and navigate through your downloads, access cloud storage, and streamline your workflow with keyboard and mouse shortcuts. We will delve into managing multiple tabs, creating tab groups, and leveraging Chrome's sync functionality for a seamless browsing experience across devices.
Moreover, we will explore lesser-known features of Chrome, such as Chrome Remote Desktop, allowing you to access your computer remotely, and Chrome's language tools for multilingual browsing.
Whether you are a student, professional, or casual user, "Mastering Google Chrome" will empower you to become a proficient Chrome user, revolutionizing your browsing experience and increasing your productivity. Join us on this exciting journey and unlock the full potential of Google Chrome!
target_audience: This course is for anyone who wants to learn more about Google Chrome. It is perfect for beginners and experienced users alike.  If you are a beginner, this course will teach you the basics of using Google Chrome, such as how to install and set up Chrome, how to navigate the Chrome interface, and how to use Chrome extensions.  If you are an experienced user, this course will teach you how to use Google Chrome more effectively, such as how to customize Chrome settings, troubleshoot common Chrome problems, and use Chrome for web development.  No matter what your level of experience, this course will help you learn more about Google Chrome and how to use it to its full potential.  Here are some specific examples of people who would find this course valuable:  New users of Google Chrome who want to learn the basics of using the browser. Experienced users of Google Chrome who want to learn how to use the browser more effectively. Web developers who want to learn how to use Google Chrome for web development. Anyone who is interested in learning more about Google Chrome.

En este curso de Gmail aprenderemos desde cero todos los usos y funciones de esta estupenda herramienta de Google para el envío y recepción de correos electrónicos.

Gmail es sin duda la plataforma de correo electrónico más completa, flexible y versátil en la actualidad. Y si además consideramos todas las vinculaciones e integraciones que tiene con el resto de herramientas de Google, la hacen perfecta para aumentar nuestra productividad.

En la mayoría de casos, sólo usamos un pequeño porcentaje de todas las herramientas que tenemos disponibles en la plataforma. Efectivamente, Gmail no sólo nos es de utilidad para enviar y recibir correos electrónicos, sino que podemos hacer mucho más con esta gran plataforma.

A lo largo de nuestro curso, aprenderemos todos los usos, técnicas y algunas “funciones ocultas” para sacarle el máximo rendimiento a este extraordinaria plataforma. Desde los envíos de correos hasta respuestas automáticas, pasando por tareas, contactos, o incluso ciertos complementos y extensiones que nos ahorrarán horas de trabajo.


Curso de Gmail, ¡Desde Cero Hasta Experto!, es el curso más completo , lleno de funciones y estrategias para aprender cómo crear, enviar y gestionar tus correos electrónicos en Gmail eficazmente, de forma rápida y sencilla, el curso más completo que encontrará en Internet.

courses.title: Simplify + Organise your Notes with Google Keep
courses.bio: Learn how to keep your notes organised, decluttered, and easily available to you at any time, wherever you are.
objectives: Learn the different ways to access Google Keep
Create notes and lists to help you organise your ideas
Organise notes using labels, colours and archiving
Apply drawings and images to make your notes more cohesive
Collaborate with others by sharing notes
Learn how to apply both place and time reminders
Use the settings to help Keep work for you
Boost your productivity by integrating Keep with Gmail, Docs and Calendar
Access Keep wherever you are by learning how to use the app on mobile

Access + Overview: The different ways to access Google Keep
Drawing: How to add a drawing to your note
Keep App: Using the Keep app on Android

requirements: This course is for you even if you’ve never used (or even heard of) Google Keep. I keep things as simple as possible, and the video lessons are bite sized so you won't feel overwhelmed
You will need an active Google account (free or paid), a computer and/or phone (I show you how to use Google Keep on both)
courses.description:
Do you feel overwhelmed by the huge amount of notes that you have?
Notes that are written in a number of notebooks scattered around your desk, or on post-it notes stuck to your kitchen worktops and appliances...
Do you start a new Google Doc every time you think of an idea, just because you know how easy it is to share that doc with someone?
So you end up with lots of typed notes saved in various random documents on your desktop or in your Google Drive?


I hear you!
I have LOTS of notebooks, so I know how hard it is to find that 'amazing' business idea that's written down in one of those notebooks!
I know how frustrating it is when you just can't put your hands on 'that' brilliant gift idea you had for your favourite auntie's next birthday!


I hate to break it to you, but it's time to get organised!


If you want to put all of your notes together in the one place that you can easily access from wherever you are - then you need Google Keep!
Google Keep is Google’s free note taking app. It syncs across all of your devices, and it is very user friendly.
Not only is Keep useful for keeping all of your business / professional ideas at your fingertips, but it’s also handy for personal use, like your weekly grocery shop (trust me, I use this every week for my own shopping!)


If you've never used Keep before, don't panic!
This course is for you even if you’ve never used (or even heard of) Google Keep. Or maybe you tried using it once before but didn’t know what you were doing.
Don't worry, I keep things as simple as possible, and the video lessons are bite sized so you won't feel overwhelmed.
I even show you how to use it on your mobile phone, so you've no excuse for not being organised 'on the go'!


Just imagine...
... knowing exactly where to find your notes about your next meeting,
... being able to quickly find the list of gift ideas you've been collecting for the past 6 months whenever inspiration hit,
... receiving a notification reminding you to read a particular note a few minutes before meeting a prospective client,
... adding to your notes when you're out & about and you have a sudden 'aha' moment,
... having a central location for your home DIY project ideas, including images & drawings, that can be easily shared with your partner.


I'd love you to join me as I show you that Google Keep is so much more than note taking!
target_audience: Freelancers, solopreneurs and small business owners who want to keep notes organised, decluttered, and easily available at any time, wherever you are.

courses.title: Planilhas Google - do básico ao avançado
courses.bio: Começe do zero e aprenda a resolver problemas utilizando: funções, tabelas dinâmicas, gráficos, macros e muito mais.
objectives: Google Planilhas
Google Sheets
Aprender funções básicas e avançadas do google planilhas
Criar vários tipos de Gráficos
Aprenda truques e recursos ocultos
Crie dashboards interativos e visualmente eficazes no Planilhas
Domine tabelas dinâmicas, gráficos e minigráficos para criar planilhas do Google impressionantes
usar corretamente recursos complicados, como formatação condicional

Gráficos: Introdução da seção de Gráficos (Gráfico de Colunas)
Agregar dados com o Gráfico de Barras

requirements: Uma conta gratuita do Google (você também pode configurar uma durante o curso)
Não é necessário conhecimento prévio de planilhas.
Vontade de aprender!
courses.description:
Este curso é destinado a todos que querem aprender Planilhas Google em profundidade e explorar melhor seus recursos
No final do curso os alunos poderão considerar-se usuários avançados do aplicativo com uma base sólida de conhecimento adquiridos através das seções do curso.
O Planilhas Google é uma alternativa para aqueles que não querem investir muito dinheiro em um pacote pago de aplicativos. Com este curso o aluno terá noções avançadas do aplicativo e poderá utilizar conceitos de análise e criação para seus trabalhos.
Se você já tem bons conhecimentos de planilha eletrônica ou se já fez algum módulo básico ou intermediário, esse curso é o complemento que faltava para você! Melhore suas capacidades de uso e análise de dados com os conhecimentos adquiridos nesse curso.
O que vai acontecer ao final do curso:
Você será um usuário confiante de planilhas
Você será aquele que traz soluções para a mesa em vez de problemas
Você pode lidar com análises de dados complexas com facilidade
Você criará painéis interativos e atraentes nas planilhas do Google
Você saberá a maneira certa de abordar um problema
O que você aprenderá para chegar lá:
Insira e colete dados corretamente e navegue em grandes Planilhas do Google
Práticas recomendadas e recursos úteis (e às vezes ocultos) do Planilhas
Classifique, filtre, crie visualizações de filtro e limpe os dados nas planilhas do Google
Funções de pesquisa no Planilhas Google, como PROCV, ÍNDICE & CORRESP, LOCALIZAR & SUBSTITUIR etc.
Funções essenciais de sumarização como SOMA, CONT, SOMASE, SOMASES etc.
Funções de ramificação como as funções: SE e SES
Combinando dados de outras planilhas do Google com IMPORTRANGE
Função QUERY para criar QUALQUER análise que você quiser (você aprenderá a chave para fazer isso direito)
Tabelas dinâmicas, gráficos e segmentações no Planilhas Google para apresentar seus dados
Como automatizar seu trabalho com macros e script do Google Apps
Como você vai aprender:
Muitos desafios e exercícios
Pratique atividades em que você precisa encontrar os erros
Testes
Você tem acesso a TODOS os arquivos que eu uso. Os arquivos START para que você possa acompanhar comigo e os arquivos SOLUTION caso você fique preso.
Se você é um usuário atual de planilha, faça o teste de pré-avaliação para descobrir seus pontos fracos.
Tenha certeza que vamos nos divertir!
Por que aprender o Planilhas Google?
A forma como usamos planilhas está mudando, cada vez mais o nosso trabalho está relacionado com colaboração, e isso é feito por meio de canais online, nossas planilhas também estão sendo movidas online. O Planilhas Google é um programa de planilhas on-line que oferece soluções que muitas empresas precisam no momento.
Antigamente a principal exigência das empresas era que os profissionais tivessem sólidos conhecimentos em Microsoft Excel. Agora eles estão procurando mais.
Como profissional de negócios, é importante dominar os aplicativos importantes. Você não precisa conhecê-los todos. Apenas os importantes.
E outra coisa que talvez você não saiba...
Você também pode aplicar a MAIORIA do conhecimento que aprendeu neste curso do Planilhas Google ao Microsoft Excel!
Existem muitas fórmulas e recursos úteis do Planilhas Google que economizam tempo. Tendemos a esquecer o que são se não os usarmos. Este curso lhe dará a prática necessária para aplicar a melhor solução para a tarefa em questão. Desta forma, você pode fazer mais em menos tempo.
Por que fazer este curso específico do Planilhas Google?
Este curso completo do Planilhas Google é simplesmente diferente de qualquer outro curso de Planilhas do Google.
Este curso deixará você confiante e confortável ao projetar tanto planilhas simples como as mais complexas. Você irá além do básico do Planilhas. Ao longo do curso, você será capaz de aplicar o que aprendeu imediatamente ao seu trabalho.
Você dominará novas fórmulas e aprenderá novas funções para encontrar maneiras melhores de configurar suas planilhas existentes.
Neste curso, você resolverá dezenas de exemplos práticos do mundo real. Eles o ajudarão a pensar fora da caixa para que você possa trabalhar de maneira mais inteligente e não mais difícil.

courses.title: Google Gemini A-Z: A Complete Guide on Google Gemini 2.5 Pro
courses.bio: Learn the practical capabilities of Google Gemini 2.5 pro and Google AI Studio | Free world-class LLM model by Google
objectives: Craft compelling and effective prompts for Google Gemini to produce desired outputs across various tasks
Generate professional-quality emails and presentations using Google Gemini to enhance workplace communication and productivity
Solve complex Excel problems by harnessing Gemini's capabilities, improving data analysis and reporting efficiency
Summarize large texts and YouTube videos efficiently with Gemini, enabling quick comprehension of extensive information

Ethical considerations while using Gemin: Ensure ethical use of Google Gemini

courses.description:
Are you ready to unlock the full potential of Google Gemini 2.5 Pro and Google's AI studio and revolutionize the way you interact with digital tools? Have you ever wondered how to craft prompts that yield exactly what you need, whether it's for office work, content creation, or coding? If you find yourself nodding along, you've stumbled upon the perfect course to transform your curiosity into skill.
"Google Gemini A-Z: A Complete Guide on Google Gemini 2.5 Pro" offers a comprehensive deep dive into the world of Google Gemini, teaching you how to leverage this powerful tool to your advantage. Through hands-on experience and practical exercises, you'll discover how Google Gemini can become an indispensable ally in your digital arsenal.
In this course, you will:
Develop proficiency in prompt writing to communicate effectively with Google Gemini.
Master the application of Gemini in various contexts, from routine office tasks like email and presentations to creative endeavors such as writing ad copy and designing images.
Harness the power of Gemini for technical tasks, including writing SQL code and developing websites, to streamline your workflow and enhance productivity.
Explore the potential of Gemini in personal branding by creating standout resumes and LinkedIn profiles.
Navigate the ethical landscape of AI usage, understanding the importance of mitigating bias and ensuring ethical practices.
Why Google Gemini? In an era where digital literacy is paramount, mastering Google Gemini places you at the forefront of technological innovation. Its versatile capabilities open up new avenues for efficiency, creativity, and problem-solving.
You'll engage in practical exercises, from crafting compelling ad texts and images to summarizing texts and translating content. These activities are designed not only to build your skills but also to inspire innovation in your approach to digital tasks.
This course stands out by not just teaching you about Google Gemini, but also by empowering you to apply its capabilities across a wide spectrum of tasks, making you more efficient and creative. With a focus on practical applications and ethical considerations, it prepares you for responsible and innovative use of AI in your daily life and work.
Take the first step towards mastering Google Gemini and reshaping your digital interactions. Enroll now and begin your journey to becoming a Google Gemini expert.
target_audience: Professionals in various fields seeking to understand how to use AI and language models like Google Gemini in their work

courses.title: Google Agenda - Curso Completo
courses.bio: Crie e gerencie os seus compromissos e lembretes de forma fácil e prática com o Google Agenda.
objectives: No módulo 01 você irá conhecer a interface e alterar a aparência do Google Agenda.

No módulo 02 você irá aprender a como criar um evento na sua agenda, criar eventos durante todo o dia e eventos repetidos, criar tarefas, criar lembretes, editar e excluir eventos da agenda, adicionar convidados para um evento, verificar disponibilidade de horário de um convidado, configurações de eventos e notificações, criar horários disponíveis.
No módulo 03 você irá aprender a como responder um convite para um evento e também a como visualizar as respostas aos seus convites.

No módulo 04 você irá aprender a como criar uma agenda secundária, criar eventos na agenda secundária, ocultar e excluir outras agendas e também a como pesquisar eventos passados, presentes e futuros na sua agenda.

No módulo 05 você irá aprender a como se inscrever na agenda de outra pessoa, adicionar um calendário ICS, compartilhar sua agenda com outras pessoas, compartilhar sua agenda no formato ICS e a integrar a sua agenda em um site WordPress.
No módulo 06 você irá aprender a como exportar sua agenda Google e a importar eventos para o Google Agenda.

No módulo 07 você irá aprender a como instalar o App Google Agenda no seu smartphone, conhecer todos os elementos visuais que compõem a interface do App Google Agenda, criar eventos utilizando o App, criar tarefas e a como criar metas.
